Time_count.name: Time Counter
Time_count.desc: 32 bit counter in units of msrc elapsed since boot-up

FPA_Temp.name: FPA Temp
FPA_Temp.desc: In counts(prior to conversion to Kelvin)

House_Temp.name: Housing Temp
House_Temp.desc: In counts(prior to conversion to Kelvin)

FPA_Temp_at_last.name: FPA Temp at last FFC
FPA_Temp_at_last.desc: Updated every FFC. Units are Kelvin x 100

Time_count_at_last.name: Time counter at last FFC
Time_count_at_last.desc: Updated every FFC. Units are msec

House_Temp_at_last.name: Housing Temp at last FFC
House_Temp_at_last.desc: Updated every FFC. Units are Kelvin x 100

Video_output.name: Video Output Format
Video_output.desc: Video Output Format modes, datsheet, page 40

Gain_mode_des.name: Gain Mode Desired Flag
Gain_mode_des.desc: 0=current gain mode is desired,1=gain mode switch desired

Temp_Gain_mode_H_L.name: Temperature Gain Mode Threshold High to Low(degC)
Temp_Gain_mode_H_L.desc: Temperature threshold in degC used to determine when an Auto switch to Low gain mode (while in High gain mode) should occur in Radiometry enabled/TLinear disabled mode

Temp_Gain_mode_L_H.name: Temperature Gain Mode Threshold Low to High(degC)
Temp_Gain_mode_L_H.desc: Temperature threshold in degC used to determine when an Auto switch to High gain mode (while in Low gain mode) should occur in Radiometry enabled/TLinear disabled mode

Temp_Gain_mode_H_L_K.name: Temperature Gain Mode Threshold High to Low(K)
Temp_Gain_mode_H_L_K.desc: Temperature threshold in Kelvin used to determine when an Auto switch to Low gain mode (while in High gain mode) should occur in Radiometry enabled/TLinear disabled mode

Temp_Gain_mode_L_H_K.name: Temperature Gain Mode Threshold Low to High(K)
Temp_Gain_mode_L_H_K.desc: Temperature threshold in Kelvin used to determine when an Auto switch to High gain mode (while in Low gain mode) should occur in Radiometry enabled/TLinear disabled mode

Pop_Gain_mode_H_L.name: Population Gain Mode Threshold High to Low
Pop_Gain_mode_H_L.desc: Population threshold in percent of the Gain Mode ROI when an Auto switch to Low gain mode(while in High gain mode) should occur

Pop_Gain_mode_L_H.name: Population Gain Mode Threshold Low to High
Pop_Gain_mode_L_H.desc: Population threshold in percent of the Gain Mode ROI when an Auto switch to High gain mode(while in Low gain mode) should occur

Spot_Mean.name: Spotmeter Mean
Spot_Mean.desc: Spotmeter mean value in Kelvin within ROI

Spot_Max.name: Spotmeter Maximum
Spot_Max.desc: Spotmeter max value in Kelvin within ROI

Spot_Min.name: Spotmeter Minimum
Spot_Min.desc: Spotmeter min value in Kelvin within ROI

Spot_Pop.name: Spotmeter Population
Spot_Pop.desc: Number of pixel in spotmeter ROI
